definition.name: Azure Functions Action
definition.description: Deploy Function App to Azure Functions
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Function App

inputs.name: package
inputs.description: Path to package or folder. *.zip or a folder to deploy

inputs.name: slot-name
inputs.description: Function app slot to be deploy to

inputs.name: publish-profile
inputs.description: Publish profile (*.publishsettings) file contents with web deploy secrets

inputs.name: respect-pom-xml
inputs.description: Automatically look up Java function app artifact from pom.xml (default: 'false'). When this is set to 'true', 'package' should point to the folder of host.json.

inputs.name: respect-funcignore
inputs.description: Remove unwanted files defined in .funcignore file (default: 'false'). When this is set to 'true', 'package' should point to the folder of host.json.

inputs.name: scm-do-build-during-deployment
inputs.description: Enable build action from Kudu when the package is deployed onto the function app. This will temporarily change the SCM_DO_BUILD_DURING_DEPLOYMENT setting for this deployment. To bypass this and use the existing settings from your function app, please set this to an empty string ''. To enable remote build for your project, please set this and 'enable-oryx-build' both to 'true'. By default, GitHub Action respects the packages resolved in GitHub workflow, disabling the redundant build action from Kudu endpoint. (default: 'false').

inputs.name: enable-oryx-build
inputs.description: Use Oryx Build from Kudu when the package is deployed onto the function app. (Linux functions only). This will temporarily change the ENABLE_ORYX_BUILD setting from this deployment. To bypass this and use the existing settings from your function app, please set this to an empty string ''. To enable remote build for your project, please set this and 'scm-do-build-during-deployment' both to 'true'. By default, GitHub Action respects the packages resolved in GitHub workflow, disabling the redundant build action from Kudu endpoint. (default: 'false').

inputs.name: sku
inputs.description: For function app on Flex Consumption plan, set this to 'flexconsumption'. You can skip this parameter for function app on other plans. If using RBAC credentials, then by default, GitHub Action will resolve the value for this paramter. But if using 'publish-profile', then you must set this for function app on Flex Consumption plan.

inputs.name: remote-build
inputs.description: For function app on Flex Consumption plan, enable build action from Kudu when the package is deployed onto the function app by setting this to 'true'. For function app on Flex Consumption plan, do not set 'scm-do-build-during-deployment' and 'enable-oryx-build'. By default, GitHub Action respects the packages resolved in GitHub workflow, disabling the redundant build action from Kudu endpoint. (default: 'false').

outputs.name: app-url
outputs.description: URL to work with your function app

outputs.name: package-url
outputs.description: URL to the package zip file if using package deployment
